articles.description: The next-generation Kia Forte could be renamed K4. Our exclusive rendering shows how it might look, and we share other info about the new sedan.
articles.content: Kia is evolving, both in terms of design and nomenclature. As far as design goes, we can suss out with reasonable accuracy how future vehicles will look based on spy photos of prototypes. Names, howe… [+3373 chars]
